title: April fools joke to surpass URF?
body: So, hear me out, rotating game mode where the game reverts to a random previous patch......

replies.body: That would take an enormous amount of work.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HmoKEYgW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-03-15T01:01:02.335+0000)
>
> That would take an enormous amount of work.

What would be worse is if each player was on their own version.......
The current client is a neverending april fools joke :)
